arts.ttl: Messi, Ronaldo & Neymar included - The most assists in Champions League history
arts.sum: The Champions League is back after a three-week hiatus due to the international break and it’s reached a pivotal stage of the new league phase. The re-formatting of the most prestigious...

arts.ttl: Barça to PSG was never the plan for Neymar, says father
arts.sum: Neymar is currently injured and hoping to recover in time to play in the new FIFA Club World Cup. His contract runs until 2025, and his father spoke about his future on the Roundcast podcast. PSG was never the Neymar plan

arts.ttl: Neymar's father: Al-Hilal exit? 'We are preparing for it'
arts.sum: Now, his father Neymar Santos Sr. has spoken about the 32-year-old's future, admitting that the opportunity to freely pick his next club is a 'gift' and that his camp is preparing for the transfer market. Neymar Santos Sr. has addressed the speculation surrounding his son's Al-Hilal future.
